Installation¶

PIP¶

Install Shinyhero36 with pip

$ pip install reponame

The development version can be downloaded from its page at GitHub.

$ git clone https://github.com/Shinyhero36/reponame
$ cd reponame
$ python setup.py develop

Python Version¶

It’s recommended to use the latest version of Python. Shinyhero36 support Python 3.6 and newer.

Dependencies¶

Shinyhero36 has the following dependencies (which will be automatically installed if you use pip):

  • Flask version 2.0.X

Shinyhero36 is now installed. Check out the Quickstart or go to the Documentation Overview.
